headline: 2 Growth Stocks to Buy Now and Hold for 10 Years
summary: Growth stocks are a great way to build lasting wealth, but it's important to choose wisely.  Buying shares of promising companies that are tapping into a huge market for their products can lead you to long-term winners.  Focusing on the brands and experiences where young people are spending more time could be a lucrative opportunity for long-term investors.
